snippet.title: Fight'N Rage for PS4, Switch and XBOX ONE Trailer (US)
snippet.description: Fight’N Rage is a brand new old-school side-scroller beat’em up. Inspired by the classics from the “golden age”, and with an art style that mimics the aesthetic from the 90's arcade gems, this game pays homage to all classic gameplay features that make this genre one of the best from its time!
